hpa.spatial 0.2.13.9000

Package index

All functions

check_for_internal_polygon()
Check for (and return if so) the shape if it is "internal" (contained within hpa.spatial/hpa.spatial.data)
create_child_geo()
Create a child geography (polygon) which fits neatly into a parent geography
get_correspondence_tbl()
Get a correspondence table, either via strayr::read_correspondence_tbl or by creating one with make_correspondence_tbl
get_mb21_poly()
Get Mesh Blocks (2021 edition) polygons
get_mb21_pop()
Get Mesh Blocks (2021 edition) and population counts
get_mmm19_poly()
Modified Monash Model polygons (SA1, 2016 edition, polygons with MMM, 2019 edition column)
get_polygon()
Get shapefiles from ABS (via strayr and absmapsdata or via hpa.spatial and hpa.spatial.data)
make_correspondence_tbl()
Create a correspondence table between any two geographies
map_data_with_correspondence()
Map data between editions using correspondence tables from the ABS.
read_hpa_spatial_data()
Read a dataset from <github.com/healthpolicyanalysis/hpa.spatial.data/>

Developed by Rex Parsons.
